citations.narrative:
Numerous cobwebs were observed on the ceiling above the enclosure for the kangaroo and cavy. The cobwebs have
collected dust and debris over time. Premises (buildings and grounds) shall be kept clean and in good repair in order to
protect the animals from injury and to facilitate the prescribed husbandry practices set forth in this subpart.
To be corrected by 7-11-25

There appears to be a lack of adequate pest control procedures at the facility. Numerous flies were observed throughout
the facility. Flies were observed in the food and water bowls of the serval and silver fox. The licensee must create and
maintain an effective program for the control of insects, ectoparasites, and avian and mammalian pests.
.To be corrected by 7-11-25
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.131(c) 
   
Sanitation. 
Numerous cobwebs were observed on the ceiling above the enclosure for the kangaroo and cavy. The cobwebs have 
collected dust and debris over time. Premises (buildings and grounds) shall be kept clean and in good repair in order to 
protect the animals from injury and to facilitate the prescribed husbandry practices set forth in this subpart. 
To be corrected by 7-11-25 
3.131(d) 
   
Sanitation. 
There appears to be a lack of adequate pest control procedures at the facility. Numerous flies were observed throughout 
the facility. Flies were observed in the food and water bowls of the serval and silver fox. The licensee must create and 
maintain an effective program for the control of insects, ectoparasites, and avian and mammalian pests.  
.To be corrected by 7-11-25 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n
